channel.title: Osiris - 742 Protocol
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[img]http://puu.sh/bYfF9/11530976a9.png[/img]
[B][COLOR="#FFD700"]Developers[/COLOR][/B] Fuzen Seth Demon scopez
[B][COLOR="#FFD700"]Goal with Osiris[/COLOR][/B] Our goal is to create enjoyable 742 RSPS packed out with unique and outstanding features, which is not a problem. I have also no much experience with 742s so this will be something new and fun to me too. There will be truly some never-seen content and a lot.
[B][COLOR="#FFD700"]Content done[/COLOR][/B] Noticeboard tab and basic configurations for server. Added player based grand exchange. Going to modify it soon though for like 40-50 players. Added Polypore staff charging and proper item charges system.
[B] [COLOR="#FFD700"]Media[/COLOR][/B] [img]http://puu.sh/bYcOd/30b8cdf036.jpg[/img]
Note: Most of the tabs do work in noticeboard. Needs more configuration though. [img]http://puu.sh/bYdtr/58d7567fb7.jpg[/img]
Heres also some pics of co-op [img]http://puu.sh/bWiao/2d9da1a757.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8HJQC.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8HJVI.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8EsfI.jpg[/img]
I've started working on miscellanious content aswell.
[img]http://puu.sh/8HP3N.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8HOh7.jpg[/img] [I]
Note: Thread unfinished.[/I][/CENTER]

item.title: Osiris - 742 Protocol
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

Elrick:

Do the requirements for the quests at least. Make them at least work for the decent spell books and prayers. I’ve always hated how most RSPS take a challenge out of the game, and if there is a challenge then it is based on the exp rate.

Yes they will be done, I don’t want this server be like that people get maxed in a day and such, I want the 99s be a actual achievement. The reason I add content like this is that it will give motivation in the way of mastering the character.

OTHERWISE:

I’ve been working on Mod Mark MC Donald’s store.

Reset button works :), gotta find a shitload of configs though.

Finished a basic bones-on-altar.

Also if you talk to a NPC from a distance it’s a actual target and doesn’t just walk next of the clicked NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Osiris - 742 Protocol
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Do the requirements for the quests at least. Make them at least work for the decent spell books and prayers. I’ve always hated how most RSPS take a challenge out of the game, and if there is a challenge then it is based on the exp rate.

Read full topic

item.title: Osiris - 742 Protocol
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:4, topic:547073”]Are you looking to make this into an actual project? Like a remake? I mean why start on a quest system if you would not use it.

Looking forward to your progress, looks slick so far[/quote]

For now we aim for realistic content, there will be in official version quests for curse prayer etc, what I mean by that we will be adding the neccessary quests such as
*Temple of the senntisten
*Desert treasure
*Lunar Diplomacy
*Recipe for disaster

These quests will be exactly the same as actual RuneScape. But to be honest I haven’t decided yet should I add the sub quests.

But yeah we will tune this to a ‘rsps’ some day. I also personally enjoy myself adding unique, real rs content.

OT:
Started on random events handler.

Read full topic

item.title: Osiris - 742 Protocol
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Are you looking to make this into an actual project? Like a remake? I mean why start on a quest system if you would not use it.

Looking forward to your progress, looks slick so far

Read full topic

item.title: Osiris - 742 Protocol
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

InfusedScape:

RIP RSPS’s. Kids don’t even know what a delta is thanks to this ugly shizz

This isn’t a basic 718/742 it’s legit 742. Delta days were the shit though.

OT:

I’ve been working ass off on the quest system, for the first I want to apology for not having correct colors for quest but they’re easy to change it’s still in testing stage and not even close to finish but the actual base for system is complete.

Read full topic
